content: the ripple bucket hat is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern that combines style and function using bulky yarn to create a soft textured hat with a sturdy brim that holds its shape beautifully whether you re making it for yourself a loved one or as a chemo cap this design offers comfort versatility and fashion all in one pattern features 1 well written crochet pattern 2 easy to find yarn uses a 5 bulky 3 video support on how to ch3 and join in a ring 4 list item yarn suggestions loops & threads textured twist pastel rainbow lion brand homespun or similar boucle-style bulky yarns see yarnsub com for options i am a breast cancer survivor with a passion for creating beautiful and functional chemo caps whether you re crocheting for a loved one a donation or for yourself this hat offers comfort warmth and timeless style copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright krissys over the mountain crochet©2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product
